Title: Relates to the unlawful wearing of body armor
Summary: Relates to the unlawful wearing of a body vest; provides that a person is guilty of the unlawful wearing of a body vest when such person commits a certain misdemeanor or felony and in the course of and in furtherance of such crime such person wears a body vest.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to the unlawful wearing of body armor
